summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3194, for the improvement of Boyer Avenue, 12th Avenue North and Fuhrman Avenue, being a continuous street from 23rd Avenue North to Eastlake Avenue; all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 39434 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
